channel.title: Mopar Scape Server
channel.description: Hello, Im new to making Mopar Scape servers so can someone explain how to make one. Do I need a FTP for this server creation and if so would FileZilla work?. Also what are the files I need to host a server and bla, I don't even understand what im saying.... SOOOOO coulda ya help. Thanks

item.title: Mopar Scape Server
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Click here. That’s as easy as it gets. Mod Taharok explains very well and in much detail and also in ‘newbie’ language. Good luck.
